searchPlaceholder: Input keyword to search or press Enter to show latest records

config.title: Configuration
config.servicesRestartingMessage: Services are restarting. Please wait until the process completes. This may take a few moments...
config.servicesRestartTimeout: Service restart timed out. Please check server logs for issues.
config.servicesRestartAbnormal: Service processes abnormal. Multiple processes detected or missing required service processes.
config.restartConfirmMessage: This will restart all services and may cause temporary interruption. Are you sure you want to continue?

general.title: General Configuration
general.baseDirDesc: The base directory for storing application data.
general.databasePathDesc: Path to the database file. Can be a relative path or a full URL for SQLite or PostgreSQL.
general.defaultLibraryDesc: The default library name to use for storing screenshots.
general.enableFacetDesc: When set to true, enables filtering of search results based on specific attributes or dimensions.
general.defaultPluginsDesc: Select plugins to enable by default

server.title: Server Configuration
server.hostDesc: The host address to listen on. Use '0.0.0.0' to listen on all interfaces.
server.portDesc: The port number for the server to listen on.

record.title: Record Configuration
record.intervalDesc: Time between screenshot captures. Shorter intervals mean denser data capture, reducing missed data but increasing storage costs.

watch.title: Watch Configuration
watch.rateWindowSizeDesc: Number of recent events to consider when calculating processing rates.
watch.sparsityFactorDesc: Controls file processing frequency. Higher value means less frequent processing. 1.0 means process every file.
watch.processingIntervalDesc: Initial processing interval for file processing. Process one file with plugins for every N files. Will be adjusted automatically based on processing rate.
watch.idleTimeoutDesc: Number of seconds without new files before marking state as idle.
watch.idleProcessDesc: Time interval for processing skipped files when system is idle (HH:MM format).

ocr.title: OCR Settings
ocr.forceJpegDesc: Convert images to JPEG format before OCR
ocr.endpointDesc: Only used if not using local OCR
ocr.concurrencyDesc: Maximum number of concurrent OCR requests

vlm.title: VLM Settings
vlm.modelNameDesc: Vision language model for image description
vlm.forceJpegDesc: Some models may not support WebP format
vlm.promptDesc: Text prompt for generating image descriptions

embedding.title: Embedding Settings
embedding.changeWarningPrefix: Changing the embedding model or dimensions requires restarting services and reindexing. After changes, run
embedding.useModelScopeDesc: Pull model from ModelScope instead of Hugging Face
embedding.modelDesc: Model name for generating text embeddings
embedding.dimensionsDesc: This field is typically related to the embedding model; please set it according to the model documentation.
embedding.endpointDesc: Only used if not using local embedding
